front.title: Port Control Protocol (PCP) Extension for Port Set Allocation

abstract.t: In some use cases, e.g.,Lightweight 4over6 (lw4o6) [RFC7596], the client may require not just one port, but a port set. This document defines an extension to the Port Control Protocol (PCP) allowing clients to manipulate sets of ports as a whole. This is accomplished by a new MAP option: PORT_SET.
